channel.title: The World's Smallest TFS Proxy is Dead
channel.description: This morning we had a power cut which killed a particular tricky upgrade mid-way through trashing the machine I was attempting it on.  Luckily the machine in question was a VM Ware image and I had recent taken a...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Rob Burke+00:00
item.description:
Noooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo!
You'll need to announce his resurrection, or at least let us know how the appointment with the Dell Engineer goes...
item.dc:creator: Rob Burke

item.title: Comment by Simon Phillips+00:00
item.description: In my last job, we had get the motherboard changed on nearly all our Dell Omni-Plexs GX-210??. It was like having loads of pop-corn machines with all the capacitors popping :S
item.dc:creator: Simon Phillips
